courses.title: Aviation Safety Management System
courses.description: Comprehensive guide to safety protocols and hazard identification in aviation operations. Learn how to maintain the highest standards of safety for Citilink fleet.

assignment.question: What is the primary goal of SMS?
options: To ensure safe operations and identify hazards

assignments.question: What is the primary objective of a Safety Management System (SMS)?
options: Identifying hazards and managing safety risks

assignments.question: Which of these is a key component of Safety Assurance?
Hazard identification should be...
options: Ignored if costs are too high

assignments.question: Which document outlines Citilink's committed approach to safety?
Management of Change is necessary when...
options: New equipment or procedures are introduced

learningOutcomes: Implement hazard identification and risk assessment (HIRA) in airport operations.
Develop robust aviation safety policies aligned with Citilink standards.
Execute reactive and proactive safety monitoring methods and safety assurance.

courses.title: Customer Service Excellence for Cabin Crew
courses.description: Master the art of providing world-class service to Citilink passengers. Focus on communication, problem-solving, and hospitality.
learningOutcomes: Deliver premium hospitality following Citilink service standards.
Master de-escalation techniques for passenger conflict resolution.
Communicate effectively in high-pressure in-flight environments.

courses.title: Airbus A320 Technical Overview
courses.description: Technical deep dive into the systems and operations of the Airbus A320, the backbone of the Citilink fleet.
learningOutcomes: Understand core aircraft systems and cockpit instrumentation of A320.
Execute standard operating procedures for various A320 flight phases.
Perform basic technical troubleshooting and systems monitoring.

courses.title: Emergency Evacuation Protocols
courses.description: Critical procedures for ensuring passenger safety during emergency evacuations. Covers land and water ditching scenarios.

courses.title: Dangerous Goods Regulations (DGR)
courses.description: Learn to identify, handle, and report dangerous goods in compliance with IATA regulations.

courses.title: Crew Resource Management (CRM)
courses.description: Enhance teamwork and communication in the cockpit and cabin to minimize human error.

courses.title: Aviation Security Awareness
courses.description: Understanding security threats and maintaining vigilance to protect aircraft, passengers, and crew.

courses.title: First Aid for Cabin Crew
courses.description: Essential medical training for handling in-flight medical emergencies, from CPR to treating minor injuries.

lessons.title: Allergic Reactions and Medical Kit Guide

courses.title: Meteorology for Pilots
courses.description: Advanced weather patterns, reading radar, and decision-making in adverse weather conditions.

lessons.title: Alternate Selection and Weather Decision Guide

courses.title: Fatigue Risk Management
courses.description: Strategies to recognize and mitigate fatigue to ensure alertness during flight operations.

courses.title: Introduction to Aviation Law
courses.description: Basics of aviation regulations and legal framework for airlines.

courses.title: Ground Handling Procedures
courses.description: Standard procedures for ground operations and safety.

courses.title: In-flight Sales Strategy
courses.description: Maximize revenue through effective in-flight service and sales.

courses.title: Leadership in Crisis
courses.description: How to lead teams effectively during emergency scenarios.

courses.title: First Aid for Flight Crews
courses.description: Essential medical procedures and emergency care in the air.

courses.title: Airport Security Protocols
courses.description: Standard security measures and threat identification at airports.
